svg.title: Example arcs01 - arc commands in path data
svg.desc: Picture of a pie chart with two pie wedges and https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG/paths.html#PathDataEllipticalArcCommands https://www.december.com/html/spec/colorsvg.html https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scalable_Vector_Graphics#Pfad a picture of a line with arc blips
